entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 09:25 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
